1143.title: More

11433.content: Sully is watching a concert video of the Decibulls, when Kitty walks into the room. She looks and asks, "Hey there Sully, you seem pretty excited, ore tan ever. What's up?" Sully replies, "Well Kitty, the Decibulls are trying out something very new, and this video shows it off." Just then, he notices something on the TV. "Oh, here it s now" he said. The leader of the Decibulls, the shortest one with the nose ring, comes to center stage and announces "We've got something special for you, mates! We are gong to try out our brand new instruments and you will love 'em!" The trio then put down their other instruments and pull out Tubas from behind their backs. "Alright! Lets get ready to make you all horny!"
11433.title: Tuba

info.brief_description: The Danger Rangers themselves need to learn the dangers of inflation.
info.description:
The Danger Rangers themselves need to learn the dangers of inflation.

You can use the Danger Rangers, Sully, Kitty, Squeeky, Burble, Burt, Gabriela, and Fallbot, in a story involving many types of inflation.

Couple rules:

No blood/guts
No death
No cussing or toliet humor
Danger Ranger characters are involved only, though they could reference other media
No OCs
No human transformation
Nothing involving the butt or the private parts
No sex except for french kissing, that is acceptable
Have fun
